comments.body:
If we are not gonna use this class at all to throw exceptions, is there any need for it? 
Doesn't look like it is solving any extra purpose than StreamsException. Can we directly extend StreamsException in the subclasses which are extending this class?

@brary Thanks for reviewing. In KIP-216, the main purpose of keeping InvalidStateStoreException is to keep compatibility, this should be important to users. Your suggestion still valuable, we can do it in the future.
